description: ff. 235. 213 x 155; 150 x 110 mm. 21 lin. Shawwāl 971. Commentary on the work of Ibn al-ʻImād al-Aqfahsī, d. 808/1405: Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 111 (no. 17) - the title Nuzhat al-quṣṣād fī sharḥ Kifāyat al-nqqād (cf. Brockelmann, GAL, 1.c. and al-Suyūṭī, Naẓm al-ʻiqyān, p. 105, lin. 13) does not appear in the ms. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى خلق الخلق بقدرته
author: Nassābah, al-ḥasan ibn Muḥammad, d. 1461
creator: Nassābah, al-ḥasan ibn Muḥammad, d. 1461
subject: Ibn al-ʻImād al-Aqfahsī, Aḥmad, ca. 1349-1405—Iqtiṣād fī kifāyat al-ʻuqqād.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
